original_text: So, those people who become God's children are human. They have human bodies. Because of that, Jesus himself became human like us. In that way, when he died he was able to destroy the Devil. It is the Devil who has power over death. So, those people who become God's children are human. They have human bodies. Because of that, Jesus himself became human like us. In that way, when he died he was able to destroy the Devil. It is the Devil who has power over death. So, those people who become God's children are human. They have human bodies. Because of that, Jesus himself became human like us. In that way, when he died he was able to destroy the Devil. It is the Devil who has power over death.
korean_text: 자녀들은 혈과 육에 속하였으매 그도 또한 같은 모양으로 혈과 육을 함께 지니심은 죽음을 통하여 죽음의 세력을 잡은 자 곧 마귀를 멸하시며

sentences.original_text: So, those people who become God's children are human.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 하나님의 자녀가 된 사람들은 인간입니다.

sentences.original_text: They have human bodies.
Because of that,
Jesus himself became human like us.
sentences.korean_translation: 예수님께서 친히 우리와 같이 인간이 되셨습니다.

sentences.original_text: In that way,
when he died
he was able to destroy the Devil.
It is the Devil who has power over death.
